verses.content: Chun, Jakobin a naupasalhai chu a ko a, a hril a; “Ni nuhnunghaia in chunga thil la tlung ding chu ka hril theina ding cheuin hung inkhâwm ro.
Nangni Jakob naupasalhai, hung inkhâwm unla, ngai ro: In pa Israel thu hi ngai ro.
Reuben, nang hi ka nau lutîr, Ka thilthawtheina, ka hrâtna ra hmasatak, Insângtakna le thuneitakna neitu i nih.
Nisienlakhawm, tui anga det lo i nih a, Chunghnungtakna chu nei naw ti nih, I pa khumpui i kai leiin: Chun, chu chu i sukpawrcheh a, ka zâlnaah i kai kha.
Simeon le Levi hi unau an nih: An kâwlhnâmhai chu thisen insuona hriemhrei an nih.
Aw ka thlarau, nang chu an inrâwnnaa chun inrawl ve naw rawh: An lunginsenin mi an that a, An kâwmawnain bâwngchal tha an sat a.

An lunginsenṭeuna chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se, a ṭium sih a. An lung puom hlena chu ṭawngsephurin um raw se,a nunrâwng sih a. Jakobrawihai lai chun anni chu thedar ka ta, Israelrawihai lai chun anni chu sukdar ka tih.
Juda, nang chu i unauhaiin inpâk an ti che, I kut chu i râlhai rîngah innghat a ta, I pa naupasalhai chu i hmaah kûn an tih.
Juda hi sakeibakneite a nih; Ka naupa, i sase chu i hang fesan tah a, A kûn a, sakeibakneichal angin a bawk a, Sakeibakneipui ang bawk siin, tuin am suktho ngam an ta?
Lal hmawl chu Judaa inthawk hin bo naw nih a, Rorêltu hmawl chu a ke kâra inthawkin bo naw bawk a tih; A neitu takpa a hung hmakhat chun; Hnam tinin ama thu awi an tih.
A sakawrte chu Grêp hruiah a thlung a, A sabengtungte chu grêp hrui ṭha miah a thlung bawk a. A silfên chu uoinah a sâwp a, A puon chu grêp thisenah.
A mithai chu uoin suksenin um a ta, A hahai chu nenetui sukvârin.
Zebulun hin tuisuoriet pangah umhmun khuor a ta, Lawngchâwlna vapang nîng a tih: A ramri chu Zidonah nîng a tih.
Issakar hi sabengtung hrâttak, Berâm huong kâra bawk a nih:
Châwlna chu ṭhain a hriet a, Ram chu inhawiin a hriet bawk a. Chuongchun, iengkhat put dingin a liengko chu a sukhnuoi a, Kuli sinthawin siehlawah a hung um tah a.
Dan hin a mihai chu,ro rêlpêk a tih. Israel hnam pakhat ni vein.
Dan hi lamliena rûl, Lampuia rûlriel, A chunga chuong a thala tla dêr khawpa Sakawr kea chuk hlaktu hi nîng a tih.
Aw LALPA i sandamna chu ka nghâk zing.
Gad hi râlin thâwng an ta, Nisienlakhawm, ama chun an kekhawng tieng thaw lem a tih.
Aser hi a fâk ṭhâng a ta, Lal tensietna suklang mi nîng a tih.
Naphtali hi sazukpui insuo a nih a, Thu ṭhatakhai a hril hlak.
Josef hi kâu ra nuomtak a nih a, Tuikhur kâwla kâu ra nuomtak chu. A kâu nâwksâwnhai chun lung bang ân zâm khum a.
Thal kâphai chun ama chu nasatakin an sukrinum a, An kâp a, an suknawmnah a:
Nisienlakhawm, ama thalngul chu ngartakin a um zing a, A kut thahai chu sukhrâtin a um a, Jakob Mihrât kut chun, (Chutaka inthawk chun berâm vêngtu, Israel lungpui chu a hung um a.)

I pa Pathien nangma ṭhangpuitu dinga, Iengkimthawthei, Chungtienga vân malsâwmnahai, Hnuoitienga bawk zing tui inthûktak malsâwmnahai, Nene le sul malsâwmnaa Nang malsâwmtu ding ngei sukhrâtin a um a.

I pa malsâwmpêkna hi, A mi thlatuhai malsâwmpêkna nêk hmanin, Chatuon tlâng tâwpkhâwk chenin a nasa ta lem a nih: Chuonghai chu Josef lua hin um a ta, A unauhaia inthawka suktuma umpa lusîpa chun um a tih.
Benjamin hi satene hnukinrawl a nih, Zîngkâr chun a sase chu fâng a ta, Zântieng chun a râllâk chu sem a tih,” tiin.
Chuong po po chu Israel hnam sâwm le hnam hni chu an nih; chun, hieng hi anni malsâwma an kuoma an pa thu hril chu a nih: an mal- sâwmna dawng ding ang peiin mal a sâwm seng a.
Chun, anni chu thuro a sieh a, an kuomah, “Ka chipuihai kuomah ṭhuoiin ka um ve ding a ni tah. Hit mi Ephron loa pûka khan ka thlatuhai lai mi phûm ve ro,

chu pûk chu Kanaan rama Mamre zâwna Makpelaa loa pûk, Abrahamin inphûmna hmun ro dinga Hit mi Ephron kuoma inthawka a lo puma a închâwk fâwm a nih, chutaka chun Abraham le a nuhmei Sara chu an phûm a:
chutaka chun Isak le a nuhmei Rebeka chu an phûm a: chutaka bawk chun Leah ka phûm a,
lo le a sûnga pûk um chu Heth thlahaia inthawka inchâwk a nih,” a tih a.
Chun, Jakob chun a naupa- salhai kuoma thuro a sie zo chun, a kehai chu khumah a hlângkai a, a thlarau ân thla tah a, a chipuihai kuoma chun ṭhuoiin a um ve tah a.
